description: Change event time but keep location (partial update). Tests that only the time is updated while location is preserved.

events.title: Design Review
events.reasoning: Alice asked to move the design review from 2 PM to 4 PM tomorrow, keeping the same design lab location. Matches calendar event [1].

mock_llm_response.summary: Updated design review from 2 PM to 4 PM, location unchanged.

notes: Reference datetime is Thursday 2026-02-19, so 'tomorrow' resolves to 2026-02-20. Short conversation (4 lines).
